wikitext.*:
'''Húrin''' means "Battle-ready mood" in [[Sindarin]] (from ''[[hûr]]'', "readiness, vigour, fiery spirit" and ''[[ind]]'', "mood"), and can refer to:

* '''[[Húrin|Húrin Thalion]] ({{FA|441}} - c. {{FA|500|n}}), the last [[Lord of Dor-lómin]] and father of [[Túrin|Túrin Turambar]], hero of the [[First Age]].'''
* [[Húrin of Emyn Arnen]] (fl. {{TA|1634}}), the first [[Stewards of Gondor|Steward of Gondor]] whose name is recorded in history.
** [[House of Húrin]], the dynastic house of the [[Stewards of Gondor|Stewards]] of [[Gondor]], named after Húrin of [[Emyn Arnen]].
* [[Húrin I]] ({{TA|2124}} - {{TA|2244|n}}), fifth [[Ruling Steward]] of Gondor.
* [[Húrin II]] ({{TA|2515}} - {{TA|2628|n}}), fourteenth [[Ruling Steward]] of Gondor.
* [[Húrin (Warden of the Keys)|Húrin the Tall]] (fl. {{TA|3019}}), [[Warden of the Keys]] of [[Minas Tirith]] at the time of the [[War of the Ring]].
